hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix

Class MatrixFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.MatrixFactory

  • public class MatrixFactory
extends Object
    Factory class for creating matrix instances.
    Author:
    Kazó Csaba

        public static Matrix identity(int size)
        Creates an identity matrix of the specified dimension.
        Parameters:
        size - the dimension of the matrix
        Returns:
        a size×size identity matrix
        Throws:

      • ones

        public static Matrix ones(int rows,
          int columns)
        Creates a matrix of the specified size whose elements are all 1.
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows
        columns - the number of columns
        Returns:
        a rows×columns matrix whose elements are all 1
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either argument is non-positive

      • random

        public static Matrix random(int rows,
            int columns)
        Creates a matrix of the specified size whose elements are pseudorandom, uniformly distributed values between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows
        columns - the number of columns
        Returns:
        a rows×columns matrix of random elements
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either argument is non-positive

      • createMatrix

        public static Matrix createMatrix(double[][] elements)
        Creates a matrix and initializes its elements from an array. The parameter should be a double[r][c] array with r>0 and c>0. The matrix element at row row and column col will be elements[row][col].
        Parameters:
        elements - the array containing the elements of the matrix
        Returns:
        the new matrix initialized from the array
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the array is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the dimensions of the array are not valid

      • createMatrix2

        public static Matrix2 createMatrix2(double[][] elements)
        Creates a matrix and initializes its elements from an array. The parameter should be a double[2][2] array. The matrix element at row row and column col will be elements[row][col].
        Parameters:
        elements - the array containing the elements of the matrix
        Returns:
        the new matrix initialized from the array
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the array is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the dimensions of the array are not correct

      • createMatrix3

        public static Matrix3 createMatrix3(double[][] elements)
        Creates a matrix and initializes its elements from an array. The parameter should be a double[3][3] array. The matrix element at row row and column col will be elements[row][col].
        Parameters:
        elements - the array containing the elements of the matrix
        Returns:
        the new matrix initialized from the array
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the array is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the dimensions of the array are not correct

      • createVector

        public static Vector createVector(double[] elements)
        Creates a vector and initializes its elements from an array.
        Parameters:
        elements - the array containing the elements of the vector
        Returns:
        the new vector initialized from the array
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the array is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the length of the array is zero
